sources.title: The Victors (1963) George Peppard Â· Eli Wallach
sources.description: Carl Foreman 's epic anti-war film follows young American infantrymen on their journey from the Allied landing in Sicily in 1942 to the end of World War II.

metadata.Plot: War has no victors, only survivors. Killing destroys the killers as well as the killed; because it murders decency, self-respect and ultimately life itself. The story follows in the footsteps of a squad of young American solders from the early days of the Battle of Britain, through the fierce fighting in Italy and France, to the uneasy peace of Berlin.
metadata.Actors: Vince Edwards, Albert Finney, George Hamilton
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award2 nominations total
